text: 16.14 2 Te 2.9, 1 Ti 4.1, Jem 3.15, Lep 16.7, 17.14, 19.6, 19.15, 19.19-20 Kɨcheki walɨjpal anɨb okok, tap mageptek okok gɨnɨgel tek lak. God ne tap okok mɨdupsek gɨnɨmuŋ tek nep mɨdeb ak, ñɨn awl ne ak gɨnɨgab anɨb ak tek, kɨcheki okok kɨli am gapman bɨnonɨm man awl keke mɨdupsek kod mɨdebal tek amnɨlak. Amɨl, gapman bɨnonɨm anɨb okok ayɨp bɨ kɨli chɨm kadɨŋ gep okok ayɨp, kɨlop poŋɨd dap nan gɨl, God ayɨp penpen gɨnɨg gɨlak.
